org.zaproxy.zap.extension.reauth

Class ReauthAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.ApiImplementor
      • org.zaproxy.zap.extension.reauth.ReauthAPI
  • Deprecated. 
    (2.3.0) Replaced by AuthenticationAPI and UsersAPI. It will be removed in a future release.

    @Deprecated
public class ReauthAPI
extends ApiImplementor

      • setReauthenticate

        public void setReauthenticate(boolean reauth)
        Deprecated. 
        Control automatic reauthentication
        Parameters:
        reauth - If true and if the user is logged out and if there is a login url defined then ZAP will attempt to automatically login when active scanning or fuzzing
